Description: Round-topped quartzite stela of Amenmosi; at the top is a representation of Thutmose IV offering to Amun-Ra; below is a representation of the deceased kneeling and five columns of Hieroglyphic text.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2009 13 Feb - 2023 17 Nov, Brighton Museum and Art Gallery, LT Loan (3 year renewable)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Thutmose IV
